attributes.action: Ban lorry mounted mobile advertising billboards.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These vehicles are environmentally unfriendly.   They add to traffic congestion and cause unnecessary air and noise pollution.  They are visually obtrusive.  When stationary such vehicles are often parked inappropriately, causing damage to pavements and verges, and obstructing the views of other road-users.
